name: as-css
description: Component-scoped CSS that runs in the browser without build tooling.

scripts.build:pages: npm run build && rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs/examples docs/src docs/dist && cp examples/*.html docs/examples/ && cp src/as-css.js docs/src/ && cp dist/as-css.min.js dist/as-css.min.js.map docs/dist/ && cp examples/index.html docs/index.html && touch docs/.nojekyll

author: Sree Kotay
